10/ Trends to watch in 2025:

 More Mobile-native games via Saga
 Interoperable assets
 Web2 platform launches (Epic, Steam)
 Gamified DeFi returns
 Infra-as-a-platform (Magicblock, Send Arcade [redacted infra])
 More Arcade games

11/ The Solana gaming cycle is here:

–– The players are here.
–– The tools are ready.
–– The funds are coming.

If you’re building games, building tools, or just playing —Solana is where it’s happening. 

Internet capital Markets. Send it.

Solana will be the economic layer for gaming.

Thanks to Memecoins, we saw an early glimpse of Solana’s fun and liquidity-driven network effects —gaming is now primed for a HUGE comeback.

Here’s why, broader 
@solana
 landscape, and what’s next

1/ In 2021–22, billions of $$ in funding flowed into crypto gaming — but infra wasn’t fully ready, and most games were unsustainable due to flawed play-to-earn mechanics.

But now, we've strong tailwinds:
–– Internet Capital Markets (memecoins & liquidity)
–– Better Gaming Infra

never a dull day to play Lana Roads on
